sect1.title: Schläge pro Minute
sect1.para: The program will play a tempo, like a metronome. You should try to guess how many beats per minute is played. Each button represents one tempo, and the program will only play in tempos that has a button with bold text. Right-click on buttons to change the status of a tempo.
Beachten Sie: Der Rhythmus hängt von der Funktion gtk timeout_add ab und ist daher nicht sehr genau.
